description: Oksana Lintz covertly activates Halden's failsafe protocol, selectively exposing Directorate abuses and erasures through authenticated BCI records while keeping wider system failures hidden for now.
A coordinated broadcast reveals Directorate-sanctioned purges, policy manipulation, and Halden's condemnation, sparking fury in scoreless districts and across the city.
Directorate agents launch harsh crackdowns on scoreless areas, shutting off local services and detaining known activists, but citizen resistance forces confrontations.
Escalating protests and fresh document leaks fuel mass calls for Directorate accountability; banners demand open tribunal as outrage spreads.
With mounting evidence, a coalition tribunal of technocrats, activists, and everyday citizens forms, putting the Directorate on trial and reviewing BCI's darkest secrets.
